system.description:
At 16th level, basic survival skills have become second nature to you. Choose one of the following options:

WOODLORE

Using your action, you can produce a flame at a momentâ€™s notice even in wet or cold environments. You can hold the flame in your hand without harming yourself or your equipment. Without additional fuel, the flame lasts for 10 minutes, shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
